shortDescription: I am a software engineer. I have made applications using MERN Stack, Swift & SwiftUI, Python Flask. I also dabbed into Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing.
aboutMe: Hi, I am Darsh Patel currently studying in University of Southern California with 3.8/4.0 GPA. I am currently working at University of Southern California as a Web Developer. I like to play Chess. This Portfolio is made using Next.js and bootstrap.
name: Darsh Patel
